PageTitle: peer enable (BGP-IPv4 multicast address family view) (group)
FuncDef:
The peer enable command enables an MBGP device to exchange routes with a specified multicast peer group.
The undo peer enable command disables an MBGP device from exchanging routes with a specified multicast peer group.
By default, an MBGP device is disabled from exchanging routes with a multicast peer group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an MBGP peer group.
The value is a string of 1 to 47 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the peer enable command is run on an MBGP device, the MBGP device establishes an MBGP connection with a specified peer or peer group.
